The Big Wolf is a canine monster found around the White Wolf Mountain. It can prove deadly to low-level players attempting to cross the mountain. There's also one west of the Feldip Hills, but sports a darker colour coat.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 December 2017
(update)

The black variant was added to the game.

4 June 2007
(update)

The black variant was added to the cache, but was unused.
